flavorText:
"It's like a reef that runs aground on ships."

foreignData.flavorText: „Stell dir ein Riff vor, das Schiffe rammt." —Jaby, Nomade vom Silundimeer
foreignData.name: Untiefenschlange
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, verliert die Untiefenschlange bis zum Ende des Zuges die Verteidiger-Fähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText: "Es como un arrecife que encalla en los barcos." —Jaby, nómada del Mar Silundi
foreignData.name: Serpiente de los bajíos
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, la Serpiente de los bajíos pierde la habilidad de defensor hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « C'est comme un récif qui s'échoue sur des navires. » —Jaby, nomade de la mer de Silundi
foreignData.name: Serpent des bancs
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Serpent des bancs perd le défenseur jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "È come una scogliera che si arena sulle navi." —Jaby, nomade del Mar Silundi
foreignData.name: Serpe delle Secche
foreignData.text:
Difensore
Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, la Serpe delle Secche perde difensore fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「船に乗り上げた岩礁みたいな物さ。」 ――シルンディ海の遊牧民、ジャビー

防衛
上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、浅瀬の海蛇はターン終了時まで防衛を失う。

Defensor

foreignData.flavorText: «Сталкиваясь с кораблями, он сам садится на мель». — Джаби, кочевник Силундийского моря

Защитник
Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Змей Мелководья теряет способность Защитника до конца хода.

守军
地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，暗礁巨蛇失去守军异能直到回合结束。

name: Shoal Serpent
originalText:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Shoal Serpent loses defender until end of turn.

rulings.text: The landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability (such as Rampant Growth) causes you to put a land onto the battlefield under your control. It will even trigger when a spell or ability causes another player to put a land onto the battlefield under your control (as can happen with Yavimaya Dryad’s ability, for example).

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.

text:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Shoal Serpent loses defender until end of turn.
